mapper.insert: insert into chat (chat_id, chat_content, chat_time, id, pro_id) values (chat_id_seq.nextval,#{chat_content},sysdate,#{id},#{pro_id})
mapper.select: select m.profile_img, m.name, s.* from member m,(select c.chat_id chat_id, c.chat_content chat_content, to_char(c.chat_time,'hh24:MI') chat_time, to_char(c.chat_time,'yy.mm.dd') chat_date, c.id id, p.filename realfilename from chat c, pro_file p where c.chat_id=p.chat_id(+) and pro_id=#{pro_id} order by chat_id asc)s where m.id=s.id
select chat_date from (select to_char(chat_time,'yy.mm.dd') as chat_date from chat where pro_id=#{pro_id}) group by chat_date order by chat_date asc
select to_char(sysdate,'yy.mm.dd') as chat_today from dual

insert.foreach: into pro_file(filename,chat_id) values (#{item},chat_get_seq) into timeline values (time_get_seq,sysdate,'time_file',#{pro_id},chat_currget_seq,'time_up',#{item}) into chat(chat_id,chat_content, chat_time, id, pro_id) values(chat_currget_seq,null,sysdate,#{id},#{pro_id})

mapper.select: select profile_img, name from member where id=#{id}
select c.chat_id chat_id, to_char(c.chat_time,'yy.mm.dd') chat_date, c.id id, p.filename realfilename from chat c, pro_file p where c.chat_id=p.chat_id and pro_id=#{pro_id} order by chat_id desc
